issue.name: Repeated Data Integration Lucene Indexing Log Messages
Admin Console Messages
issue.keywords: rows have been deleted from old

issue.name: Replies to Discussion Board Posts do not Show in My Blackboard Posts Tool
issue.description: This could be one of multiple issues, confirm via the logs
issue.recommendation: Check for error messages with the keyword and search the error in BtBB or SF

issue.name: Uninstalled Building Block Leaves Course_toc Entries that Cause Log Spam
issue.keywords: An error occurred while loading the toc named

issue.name: Log spam - Cloud errors.
issue.recommendation: Not sure. Open ticket with Cloud team maybe? Fix: http://goo.gl/1PnBdE

issue.name: Course Availability Log Spam
issue.keywords: Could not determine the course availability
issue.recommendation: Log spam. Not sure what it's caused by. Not reported in an SI or bug.

issue.name: Guest User Log Spam
issue.keywords: could not update grades for AR evaluation
issue.recommendation: Log spam, ignore. Basically such messages are logged when a guest is viewing allowed content in a course in which he is not enrolled

issue.name: Multiple Entries of Error While Getting Cached Result for Key Error
issue.keywords: Optional.get() cannot be called on an absent value

issue.name: My Blackboard Updates Tool Does Not Display Update Details
issue.recommendation: One of multiple issues. Log spam though. Articles: 000040159, 000039702, 000038226

issue.name: Permissions Errors
issue.keywords: You do not have access to view this page

issue.name: Permissions Errors 2
issue.keywords: Either you are not logged in or you do not have the appropriate privileges to perform this action.

issue.name: Analytics Info
issue.recommendation: INFO messages which can be ignored.

issue.name: Unable to remove file
issue.recommendation: Unable to remove file messages which can PROBABLY be ignored.
